description: Ayden Marx is relatively new to the biz, and even though he's got the look and the skills, he still finds himself going through the early stages of trying to forge his way. And the best way to know if you like something is to sample it for yourself, so that's just what Cody has in mind. So as Cody gets harder, Ayden warms up to the idea of the two of them working together, and before you know it, Ayden has Cody sprawled out on the desk and begging for submission as Ayden saps Cody's cock dry. If Cody's convulsing post orgasm body language has a say, Ayden Marx has got himself a new gig.Enjoy!
title: WORKING INTERVIEW
